thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Susan Marschall

author: Susan Marschall
title: Susan Marschall
text: I love this community. It is not only a good way to help others learn about the good and bad with other companies and your own experience but then you can also look up others comments and experiences. I have not only had wonderful experience with this site BUT THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS SECOND TO NONE! I have had a representative by the name of Brittany helping me out because I first review a company under the wrong name, they used to be one name now they are another and then they noticed I had two accounts under different emails. I had forgotten I had made up another account back when I had that old email. Brittany was able to (with my permission) delete the other after I emailed her from that account and requesting it. They have safety in place that I like such as that and also it showed that they do read the reviews and see that you actually are purchasing from the company and about your experience. I am very grateful to not only Brittany but this site also..
